hero.title: URLDet
hero.subtitle: Advanced URL security analysis with machine learning

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: URLDet analyzes the security of URLs using state-of-the-art machine learning algorithms.
howItWorks.feature1_desc: Determines if URLs are safe or suspicious using the Random Forest algorithm for binary classification.
howItWorks.feature2_desc: Detects detailed threat categories with a DQN model for multi-class classification.
howItWorks.feature3_desc: URLs are analyzed instantly, and results are returned within seconds.

featuresSection.title: Features
featuresSection.feature1_desc: URL structure, domain properties, and content analysis
featuresSection.feature2_desc: Detailed results with risk scores and confidence intervals
featuresSection.feature3_desc: Detects phishing, malware, and other threats
featuresSection.feature4_desc: Automatic protection with the Chrome extension

analyze.title: URL Security Analysis
analyze.inputPlaceholder: Enter the URL to analyze (e.g., https://example.com)
analyze.errorURLFormat: URL must start with http:// or https://.

result.safetyWarningText: It is recommended not to access this URL! Do not share personal information or download any files.
